title: Win a Free Ticket to Droidcon Italy!
author: Halina Kt Academy
text: How to Enter the Lottery🎟️👉 Register for the Kotlin Expert training by October 27th, 2024.👉 Complete your payment by the same date.You’ll automatically be entered into the draw. If you win, you’ll attend Droidcon Italy for free and connect with top Android professionals!Terms & ConditionsThe draw happens on October 28th, and the lucky winner will be notified by email.Sign up today — don’t miss your chance to win!Register
html:
How to Enter the Lottery🎟️

👉 Register for the Kotlin Expert training by October 27th, 2024.

👉 Complete your payment by the same date.

You’ll automatically be entered into the draw. If you win, you’ll attend Droidcon Italy for free and connect with top Android professionals!

Terms & Conditions

The draw happens on October 28th, and the lucky winner will be notified by email.

Sign up today — don’t miss your chance to win!

Register
